author: "Thomas,  Kempis, 1380-1471"
title: Girkh Thomaji Khemphacuoj jaghags hamaheteumann Khristosi thargmaneceal 'i Johannise joloveracht vardapete Kostandinoupolsecuoj; 'i chndroj D_oughajeci chod_aj Sahrati orduoj paron Khasparin
imprint: "JAmstelrodami [Amsterdam]: gortseokh, eu tsachiukh Thomasou srbaphajl episkoposi Srboj Cha_in, 1696"
